messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

On 2012/12/10 15:30:21, bketelsen wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
> mailto:rsc@golang.org),
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go/

This looks like a pretty straight forward change. 

I notice that the test for various error messages are commented out int regexp/all_test.go. It would be nice to investigate reactivating them, either in this CL, or a following one.

Procedural note:

Reitveld is very pedantic. The text of the description should read

Fixes Issue 3712.

You can update this online (edit link, top left) or with hg change 6902069 from your workstation.

On 2012/12/11 12:59:39, dfc wrote:
> Procedural note:
> 
> Reitveld is very pedantic. The text of the description should read
> 
> Fixes Issue 3712.
> 
> You can update this online (edit link, top left) or with hg change 6902069 from
> your workstation.

Thanks, Dave.  I edited the issue tag.
Will submit once A+C CL is in.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=34ec662d3e3c ***

regexp/syntax: export ErrUnexpectedParen

Fixes Issue 3712

R=golang-dev, dave, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/6902069

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
Sent CL 6873063 for the commented-out test.
